item.title: No, Anies.
item.description: Anies Baswedan. I do remember the very first time I heard his name, as there are only few people in Indonesia that directly involved in real social activities, such as Indonesia Mengajar and Turun Tangan, Anies Baswedan was one of the politician and academician that gained my respect. Plus, he performed very good speech in several occassions.

item.title: Choosing The Right Blogging Platform
item.description: After doing a several researches regarding the blogging platform, I found many headlines are confusing. Choosing the blogging platform isn't necessarily to be the best one, as nobody does it better than anybody, but it's a matter to suit your needs. Hence, choosing the right blogging platform is considered as a proper title.

item.title: Revamping My Blog
item.description:
What Is This Post About?

I’ve been blogging since 2004. The length span until 2015, doesn’t mean that I’m a good writer. I just like to write.

item.title: Adding Google Analytics for Jekyll
item.description: I have to admit that Jekyll is a really great platform. No wonder since it has been developed by the founder of Github, Tom Preston-Werner.

item.title: Goodbye (Again) Wordpress. Welcoming Jekyll and Github
item.description: All of these years, I've been trying to find a platform that suits my blog. There are numerous good blogging platform, Wordpress is one of them. But, it's too complicated and takes too many resource. Not forget to mention that it's so slow.<!-- more -->

item.title: Kenapa Saya Tidak Setuju Dolly Ditutup Oleh Risma
item.description: Penutupan lokalisasi Dolly sudah menjadi topik hangat untuk beberapa minggu belakangan. Secara pribadi, saya ga setuju sama sekali untuk pentupan Dolly. Ini bukan pendekatan agama ya, jauh-jauhin dulu. Tuhan ga ciptain prostitusi, kita yang bikin.

item.title: How I Wish Matt's Presentation Would Be
item.description: This post reflects my point of view on Wordpress as a product and its development. It's a subjective review of the presentation and does not represent MalesBanget.com ( or it might )

item.title: Ini 3 Alasan Kenapa Saya Tidak Suka AdPop Telkomsel
